dialogueTree.title: Interfacing: "The chain trails off into the ocean..."
dialogueTree.text: The chain trails off into the ocean, connecting the island to the supply depot on the coast.

links.title: You: "What for?"
links.text: What for?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at the mechani..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks at the mechanism overhead. "Ah, yes... so it seems."

links.title: Cuno: "The boy stares at the mechanism. "C..."
links.text: The boy stares at the mechanism. "Cool fucking chain."

links.title: Interfacing: "For bringing supplies: munitions an..."
links.text: For bringing supplies: munitions and fuel. You could also raise it, in order to lock the Western bay of Revachol.

links.title: You: ""What do you think it was used for?""
links.text: "What do you think it was used for?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""For bringing munitions to the isla..."
links.text: "For bringing munitions to the island, maybe? And supplies. You could also *lock* the bay, when you raise the chain."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "As a defensive measure locking off..."
links.text: As a defensive measure locking off that side of the bay.

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck does Cuno know?" He shrugs hi..."
links.text: "Fuck does Cuno know?" He shrugs his shoulders. "Cuno would use it to bring shit to the island."

links.title: You: "Lock it from whom?"
links.text: Lock it from whom?

links.title: Interfacing: "Enemies."
links.text: Enemies.

links.title: You: ""Lock it from whom?""
links.text: "Lock it from whom?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""From enemies." He looks up ahead...."
links.text: "From enemies." He looks up ahead. "Enemies of the Commune of Revachol. This seafort was a revolutionary fortification, I believe..."

links.title: You: "What kind of enemies?"
links.text: What kind of enemies?

links.title: Interfacing: "Enemies of the Commune of Revachol."
links.text: Enemies of the Commune of Revachol.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Of the future. Enemies of mankind."
links.text: Of the future. Enemies of mankind.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Enemies of madness. Lunacy. Of the..."
links.text: Enemies of madness. Lunacy. Of the apocalypse taking place here.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Do not be too eager to greet these..."
links.text: Do not be too eager to greet these enemies, black hearted cavalier -- they were also the enemies of Revachol.

links.title: You: ""This means I *sorta* got into the..."
links.text: "This means I *sorta* got into the depot door."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Technically -- no. It doesn't.""
links.text: "Technically -- no. It doesn't."

links.title: Interfacing: "He's right."
links.text: He's right.

links.title: Cuno: ""Dunno, pig, doesn't look like we b..."
links.text: "Dunno, pig, doesn't look like we behind a door right now -- just Cuno's 2 cents of course."

links.title: You: "This means I *sorta* got into the d..."
links.text: This means I *sorta* got into the depot door.

links.title: Interfacing: "Technically -- no. Sorry."
links.text: Technically -- no. Sorry.

links.title: You: "[Finish thought.]"
links.text: [Finish thought.]
